'''Buddy Doyle''' is [[Mr. Heckles]]' lawyer, who reads his will to the group on behalf of Mr. Heckles. He reveals that, since Mr. Heckles didn't have any surviving family members, he left all of his material possessions in his apartment to the "noisy girls in the above apartment", referring to [[Rachel Greene|Rachel]] and [[Monica Geller|Monica]].
